channel.title: Help
channel.description: Please help its took me forever to make a server when i put my hamachi ip in my client i upload it too mediafire. then download on my PC and i run the client and try to log in it says error connecting. it isnt the source or client because ive tried on serveral others and have the same problem, so can someone help.

item.title: Help
item.dc:creator: @Mage_mad_nes Mage mad nes
item.description:
@Mage_mad_nes wrote:

You need to have hamachi on both computers and be connected to a hamachi network when you are playing the server.

Read full topic

item.title: Help
